Articles.Content:
Re-send you in space

My hill

I steal the USS Reliant and beam you into the warp core.

My hill.

I win the game.

My hill.
Rule change, my hill.

Mod undergraded,

My hill

I invade using Communist corgis. 

My USSR hill.

I send in the Soldier.

My overly American hill.

I send in the engineer.

My overly Texan hill.

Send the soviet Red Army and ICBM

My communist hill

I send in a ork mob

my hill

I just walk in and say hi i own this hill now

my hill.

I go on a perilous quest to throw you into a volcano.

My hill.

I remember a thread like this resulting in everyone involved getting banned on some other forum I used to visit.

My hill.

call the space marines!

My hill.

I get my engineers to invent a combustible lemon that **burns your hill down.**

My burnt hill.

I make lemonade out of your silly lemons!

My burnt hill with a lemonade stand

[http://dailycaller.com/2011/08/20/capitol-police-arrest-lemonade-freedom-day-protesters/](http://dailycaller.com/2011/08/20/capitol-police-arrest-lemonade-freedom-day-protesters/)

My hill.

I invade the hill with the canadian army

My canadian-hill with maple trees and beavers

I invade with the army of the principality of sealand

My hill.

Call a ten men army

My hill

Portal-fling you out.

My hill.

I run up and push you off.

My hill.

I use a bass cannon to kick you out of the hill

My dupstep hill

A bunch of sophisticated Germans, Italians, and Englishmen stuff their top hats down the barrel of yr cannon and proceed to play chamber music. 

My refined hill.

I make a siege on the hill with German-robot-jet-tanks.

My Blitzed hill.
